webscript.description:
This webscript can be used to update an existing property definition.

There is currently support only for updating the label and/or for updating the constraints.
The current implementation supports the passing of a single constraintRef in each REST call.
The body of the PUT should be in the form, e.g.
{
   "label": "updated label value",
   "constraintRef": "rmc:constraintName",
}
In the above example JSON, a constraintRef with QName "rmc:constraintName" will be added to the
property definition. Subsequent calls with different values for constraintRef will add others.
However it is also possible to remove all constraints from the property definition by passing null:
{
   "constraintRef": null,
}
